actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1302 of the Health Maintenance Organization Act of 1973 by redefining the term "medical group".

summary.text: Expands the meaning of the term "medical group" under the Public Health Service Act to include any association the members of which engage in the coordinated practice of professional activity, irrespective of whether or not such activity is carried on in behalf of a health maintenance organization.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1302 of the Health Maintenance Organization Act of 1973 by redefining the term "medical group".
